intent_atoms.description: Provide centralized focus shortcuts and a Focus command menu for macOS and iPadOS so that outline, detail, notes, and hex panes can be navigated using the same hardware commands.
Focus shortcuts are exposed in InspectorFocusShortcutCatalog and bound to hidden keyboard accelerators and the new Focus command menu across platforms.
The explorer view’s focus binding is registered with the SwiftUI scene so that .focused scopes stay synchronized when commands fire.
Accessibility documentation reflects the updated keyboard navigation improvements.
Manual VoiceOver regression pass confirms discoverability strings and focus announcements match the updated commands on macOS and iPadOS.
